citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:29am on
December 9, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee via phone. Phone call was returned but no one was
available to perform inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:29am on 
December 9, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee via phone. Phone call was returned but no one was 
available to perform inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
